answers.answer: I'm glad your getting your appetite back just be careful. That's probably not the best for our digestive system is already running slow so eating that much can cause more acid/heart burn. Make it difficult to go to the bathroom. You should be eating enough to be full 10 plates sound really excessive and if u continue like that you could possibly run in to high blood pressure diabetes etc depending on what your eating

question: Im 18 weeks n 5 days n today is the first time i could finish 10 plates full of food at an all u can eat buffet...before i could only have one n i would be full...i was wondering if this happen to anyone else?
title: eating to much??
